FuncDef: This command enables the context to configure static pseudowire status signaling on a spoke SDP for which signaling for its SDP is set to OFF. For more information about control channel status configuration for the spoke SDP, see the7450 ESS, 7750 SR, 7950 XRS, and VSR Layer 2 Services and EVPN Guide: VLL, VPLS, PBB, and EVPN Services Guide.
